Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Threads Repost Scraper

Complete implementation of a Python-based web scraper for extracting
repost data from Threads and exporting to Markdown format.

Features:
- Browser automation using Playwright
- 2FA authentication support with session persistence
- Infinite scroll handling
- Robust DOM parsing with fallback selectors
- Markdown export with Obsidian integration
- Comprehensive error handling and logging
- CLI interface with argparse

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve text extraction from Threads reposts

Enhanced the post parser to better extract actual post content instead
of just author usernames:

- Extract author info first, then use it to filter text content
- Use multiple strategies to find post text \(longest blocks, multi-word text\)
- Filter out author username and display name from content
- Improved selectors with more comprehensive fallback options
- Prioritize longer text blocks over short single-word text

This should fix the issue where only usernames were being extracted
instead of the actual repost content.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
